com.github.shynixn.blockball.api.business.proxy

Interface BallProxy

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BallProxyImpl

    public BallProxy

    Created by Shynixn 2018.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <V,B> boolean calculateKnockBack(V sourceVector, B sourceBlock, double mot0, double mot2, double mot6, double mot8)
      Calculates the knockback for the given sourceVector and sourceBlock. Uses the motion values to correctly adjust the wall.

      • calculateKnockBack

        <V,B> boolean calculateKnockBack(V sourceVector,
                                 B sourceBlock,
                                 double mot0,
                                 double mot2,
                                 double mot6,
                                 double mot8)

        Calculates the knockback for the given sourceVector and sourceBlock. Uses the motion values to correctly adjust the wall.

        Returns:
        if collision was detected and the knockback was applied
